message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic worth but also the opportunity for mutual growth and success. I look forward to your consideration.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I recognize the value of the product, but I'm working with a tighter budget.  Would you be willing to consider $750,000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding of the product's value. While I understand your budget constraints, I am unable to match the $750,000 offer. I am willing to negotiate further, so I propose an offer of $850,000 for the product. This still allows us to work within a reasonable margin while ensuring fair compensation for the value provided. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle at $800,000?
